notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.V., M.S., A.C.M., M.A.B., and E.S. designed research; E.S., M.A.B., J.T.R., E.E.T., W.K., D.P., C.P.C., and A.I. performed research; C.V., M.S., A.C.M., M.A.B., E.S., and D.P. analyzed the data; C.V., M.S., and A.C.M. wrote the paper. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
